rooms.description: Spacious entryway with Vastu alignment ensuring positive energy flow and entrance facing north-east.
Open-concept space for living and dining with ample natural light from east-facing windows as per Vastu guidelines, promoting health and creativity.
Well-equipped fitness area in a quiet corner of the ground floor with north-east ventilation and sunlight exposure.
Integrated swimming pool with surrounding lounge space; designed with ample water drainage and safety features following local building norms.
